title: Net work - determine from a graph

content.question: The net force acting on an object as a function of its displacement is shown for the first <math alttext="10 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mstyle></math> of the objectâ€™s motion. Which of the following statements is true about the work done on the object by the net force during this interval?

choices.label: The work done on the object is negative.
The work done on the object is zero.
The work done on the object is positive.
It cannot be determined from a graph of force as a function of displacement.

content.answer: The work done on the object is positive.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
